messages.message:
Is there something here that I'm missing? I'm trying to import `deployed_solutions` using
`instabase.api_server_apps.handler.api.v2.flows import deployed_solutions` but keep getting the error message: `No module named 'instabase.api_server_apps.handler.api.v2.deployed_solutions'`
Essentially, the 'flows' directory isn't getting picked up and the compiler is looking directly in `api.v2` for `deployed_solutions`
I thought `api_server_apps` was gone and merged with `api_server` :thinking_face:

`webserver/api-server/src/py/instabase/api_server_apps/handler/api/v2/flows/deployed_solutions.py`

So this is the relative path of deployed_solutions - what should I be importing from then?
oh I see, yeah then `instabase.api_server_apps.handler.api.v2.flows.deployed_solutions` seems right to me I think — is the file there in the `build` folder?
also if this is part of a test `@patch` you _might_ need to import it first? don’t remember for sure
yes it's in the build folder - I'm following the structure of how other tests are in the folder and the only difference is that deployed_solutions is inside the "flows" folder of `api/v2`

Full error message:
```Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/franklinchian/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mock/mock.py", line 1197, in _dot_lookup
    return getattr(thing, comp)
AttributeError: module 'instabase.api_server_apps.handler.api.v2' has no attribute 'deployed_solutions'

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/franklinchian/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mock/mock.py", line 1297, in patched
    arg = patching.__enter__()
  File "/Users/franklinchian/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mock/mock.py", line 1353, in __enter__
    self.target = self.getter()
  File "/Users/franklinchian/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mock/mock.py", line 1523, in <lambda>
    getter = lambda: _importer(target)
  File "/Users/franklinchian/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mock/mock.py", line 1210, in _importer
    thing = _dot_lookup(thing, comp, import_path)
  File "/Users/franklinchian/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mock/mock.py", line 1199, in _dot_lookup
    __import__(import_path)
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'instabase.api_server_apps.handler.api.v2.deployed_solutions'```
hm, what file are you trying to import `deployed_solutions` from?
:thinking_face: yeah sorry i’m not sure then
no worries thanks for looking into this!
fixed it - just cleaned up a bunch of code and I added the file and pushed to my branch, then reran and it worked
